divs: sighting detailsi walked out my front door to go to the store approx time 6:30pm eastern time. as i walked out i noticed the moon first, then i witnessed a brilliant soft pink glowing object\craft parallel to the moon. i am unsure of the actual shape it was almost like a glider or if i had to pick a traditional or common ufo shape i would say it was cigar shaped. it was all one glowing color almost like a glow stick is the best discription i could give. it was illuminated no blinking lights no sound or contrails. unsure of height but to my eye i would say it was nearly the same height as the moon visibly. it move in a straight line path. i attempted video but it was to high to show up on my cell phone. i did capute a photo with my cell but again it did not capture what i seen with my naked eye. as the it crossed the sky in a north western path i noticed a commerical plane ascending towards the object (i saw the contrails of this plane) as the commerical plane neared the object it disappered out of sight. the whole event last 2-3 minutes in total. i am still in complete shock and amazement that i witnessed this. to my knowledge there were no other witnesses. other than the plane going towards the object.
Summary: I witnessed a brilliant soft pink glowing object parallel to the moon
